body: the locales are already set by owncloud btw

first of all this smells like a 5.0 server problem, since we did not have those reports before. second of all, i need the clients log output: start owncloud with `--logwindow` and paste the contents here while the problem occurs.
also important to know: do you have php-intl active in your setup?
i'll get you the log output within 24 hrs. i didn't install any php extensions, so the answer re php-intl should be no.

it took me some time to come back to you because i cannot post my actual log file since it contains client names.

i have now simulated a testuser. in this instance tno file deletion has happened but i still post the log. maybe it contains something useful after all.

one thing i notice that the folder is correctly named â€œyã©yã©â€? in the folder paths but incorrectly referenced as â€œyeyeâ€? in the status messages:

iâ€™m closing this issue because it has been inactive for a few months. this probably means that the issue is not reproducible or it has been fixed in a newer version.

please reopen if you still encounter this issue with the [latest stable version](http://owncloud.org/install/) (currently owncloud 5.0.9) and then please use the [issue template](https://raw.github.com/owncloud/core/master/issue_template.md). you an also contribute directly by providing a patch â€“ see the [developer manual](http://doc.owncloud.org/server/5.0/developer_manual/). :)

thank you!

i was having an issue with the oc client on mac os x, it connects to my server which is a mac os x mountain lion install with the owncloud core as noted here:

https://github.com/owncloud/mirall/issues/616#issuecomment-23112623

as such i noticed that i was having issues with the accented characters, and i realize that owncloud isn't supported to be run on os x, but i was working with an install before the accented characters issue was realized.

i also saw that these threads were dealing with this issue possibly:

https://github.com/owncloud/core/pull/3459

https://github.com/owncloud/core/issues/579

i have some information that might help towards a solution that i found, and you might already know about it but i would check it out regardless it is here:

[stack overflow - in php, how do i deal with the difference in encoded filenames on hfs+ vs. elsewhere?](http://stackoverflow.com/a/774030/634386)
